pages.text: A pedestal upgraded with this will deal damage in the effected area around it.$(li)Putting a sword into the pedestal will add it's damage to the amount being dealt by the upgrade.$(li)If the sword has sharpness, bane of arthropods, or smite, that will further increase the damage being dealt respective of the enchantment.$(br)This Upgrade Is effected by Entity Filtering Blocks placed below it.
This upgrade can accept these Enchantments:$(li)Capacity -> Increases Base Damage Dealt$(li)Range -> Increases Effective Area$(li)Speed -> Increases Attack Speed
